thread.title: Arsenal Exclusive: AC Milan plot £45m bid for Alexis Sanchez - Three-year contract offered
thread.title_full: Arsenal Exclusive: AC Milan plot £45m bid for Alexis Sanchez - Three-year contract offered

title: Arsenal Exclusive: AC Milan plot £45m bid for Alexis Sanchez - Three-year contract offered
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Arsenal Exclusive: AC Milan plot £45m bid for Alexis Sanchez - Three-year contract offered AC MILAN are poised to offer Arsenal £45million for star front man Alexis Sanchez who is stalling on signing a new contract. By Neil Fissler, Exclusive PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 22:30, Sat, Feb 11, 2017 Milan who is set for new Chinese owners Sino-Europe are ready to pay Alexis Sanchez the £250,000 that Arsenal are reluctant to pay out. Sanchez, 28, who will became a free agent at the end of next season will be given a three-year contract by Milan. GETTY AC Milan are ready to offer £45m to sign Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez The Gunners have offered him around £180,000-a-week to commit his future to the club but Sanchez is holding out for a better deal. It has given Milan hope that they will be willing to do business when the transfer window opens again in the summer. GETTY Vincenzo Montella wants to bring Sanchez to Milan GETTY Sanchez is stalling over signing a new deal at The Emirates Should Alexis Sanchez's goal against Hull have been disallowed for handball? Sat, February 11, 2017
